name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: I can't seem to memorize my SG number, and I really sympathize.    That said, the Contacts list is there more for editing and "hey, this is your list of contacts" - a lot of the usability comes through when you say, make a call to Officemate Bob who you just talked to yesterday. It really is supposed to be Fire and Forget. XD

source_obj.text: I can't seem to memorize my SG number, and I really sympathize.    That said, the Contacts list is there more for editing and "hey, this is your list of contacts" - a lot of the usability comes through when you say, make a call to Officemate Bob who you just talked to yesterday. It really is supposed to be Fire and Forget. XD
